warrior.name: Efa, defender
warrior.desc: Strong, serious - the best Sarf FC has had. This could be their season, assuming she can hit Messy with a good ol' reducer.

orc.name: Messy, winger
orc.desc: Nimble, gifted - three time winner of the Ballon d'Orc. Confused as to why the others have swords, and is starting to worry they don't know the rules.

mage.name: Kettle, midfielder
mage.desc: One of the greatest tactical minds the game has seen. They're also the inventor of astral-assisted replay, which has failed to win them any fans.

ranger.name: Canterwell, striker
ranger.desc: Almost as fast as he is vain, he is followed as much for his goals as his luscious blond locks. Never fails to give an interview, even if not invited.
